ema awasthawe sitama mahacharya fonseka waidya sabha sabhapathi dhurayata path kirima walakwimata waidya sangam dadi uthsahayaka niratha wuwada ema uthsahayan nishpala karamin saukhya amathiwaraya mema wasare janawari palamuwanida mahacharya fonseka ema dhurayata path kala athara ohu pasudama (sanduda) siya dhuraye wada bhara gaththeya.
kolambaa pradesha kihipayakata heta (19) dinaye paya 12ka kalayak jala sapayuma athhituwana bawa jathika jala sampadana saha jalapawahana mandalaya pawasayi.
deshapalana ana kriyathmaka karawima owuhu me awasanawantha iranamata path wimata hethuwa lesin boho deneku wisin saralawa prakasha karanne wuwada thiraya pitupasa aththesankirna kathawaki.

shalawe aatha kone siti ma mithuru sisuweku langa nawathunu loku mahaththaya mada welawak mithurage chitha‡∑äraya desa bala sita ohugen kumakdo wimasana ayuruth, me wana wita ethanata pamini ticharla thidenada samaga chitha‡∑äraya desa balamin sinasena ayuruth mata penuni.

paryeshana thulin op nanwuna gunathmaka henda sewawakin paratharaya piyawamu yanna themawa karagath me samarum ulela rajya sewa eksath henda sangamaya wisin sanwidhanaya kara thibini.ehidi wadiduratath andahas dakuwu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sandahan kale shri lankawe wathman rajaya rate janathawata sahana salasime aramunin wadi wiyadamak daramin janathawata awama mila ganan yatathe paribhojanaya sandaha awasthawa salasa dena bawayi.wasara gananawaka sita me rate gowi janathawa wenuwen pohora sahanadharaya labadena bawa sihipathkala mahinda rajapaksha mahatha athamun me thaththwaya awabodha karagena nomathi bawada rata sanwardhanaya kirima sandaha rajaya wiwidha wadasatahan kriyathmaka kara thibena bawada prakasha kaleya.rata sanwardhanaya nokara rakiya pamanak labadima pramanawath nowana bawa sandahan kala ee mahatha suba sadhana pahasukam salasalamin rate janathawa wenuwen samruddhi sahanadharaya labadena bawada janathawata nomilaye menma awama mila ganan yatathe labadena sahana rasak pawathina bawada pawasiya.widesha ratawalin pamina ape rata sanwardhanaya nokarana bawa ki janadhipathiwaraya heta upadina daruwan wenuwen aadambarayen jiwath wiya haki ratak nirmanaya kirima yugaye awashyathawa bawada ee sandaha yuthukam rasak apawetha pawari thibena bawada kiweya.henda hendiyan washayen nidahas saukhya sewawa haraha ihala sewawak itukarana bawa penwa dun janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me kshethraye pirisata pawathina gatalu sandaha sakachchawen wisandum soyagatha haki bawada elesa sakachchakara yam gataluwak wisanda gathahaki pirisak wathmak rajaya niyojanaya karana bawada penwa dunneya.
